room_title: Escape room "War of Rogue Machines (W.O.R.M.)" by BreakoutStudios in San Jose
room_description: The year is 2028… Superhuman Artificial Intelligence has gained control of vital infrastructure such as the power grid, satellites and the Internet as many tech leaders had predicted in 2014/2015.​It also recognized the SILICON VALLEY TECH LEADERS who spoke out against A.I. as a major threat and had them all imprisoned for life in a prison of the future.​One of tech leaders had developed a computer worm on a USB capable of destroying the A.I.​Your mission is to TRAVEL TO THE FUTURE to the tech leader’s holding cell, find the hidden USB and plug it into the network to destroy the Superhuman A.I.
